title: friendships in your 20’s, how to feel HOT + sleepovers in a relationship
itunes:title: friendships in your 20’s, how to feel HOT + sleepovers in a relationship
description:
Brooke and Danielle are getting into it this week with an updated Q+A!  The gals get into some juicy topics like birth control, sleepover schedules in their relationships, changing friendship dynamics + so much more!  Also - hear Brooke and Danielle’s best secrets to feeling HOT before stepping out!  Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and stories!
